import React from 'react' import Paper from '@material-ui/core/Paper'; import Grid from '@material-ui/core/Grid'; import ButtonBase from '@material-ui/core/ButtonBase'; import '../Style.css' export default function SearchResults(props){ const {results} = props return( <> {results && results.map((result)=>(

{result.title}

 {/*

{result.title}

Average Rating: {result.vote_average}

{result.overview}

*/}
))} ) }
